meta_title: Preventive vs Preventative: The Definitive Maintenance Verdict
meta_description: Is it Preventive or Preventative? We settle the linguistic debate, explain why SMRP standards matter, and guide you from terminology to maintenance strategy.
title: Preventive vs. Preventative: Which Term is Correct and Why It Matters for Your Maintenance Strategy
